summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD ESCAPE. WHILE DRIVING, THE STEERING WHEEL BECAME DIFFICULT TO MANEUVER AND SEIZED. ALSO, THE POWER STEERING ASSISTANT FAULT INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO A DEALER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER REFERRED THE CONTACT TO THE NHTSA HOTLINE AND DID NOT OFFER ANY FURTHER ASSISTANCE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 100,000.
